mapper.select: select * from t_user where userName=#{userName} and passWord=#{passWord}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user (userName, passWord, phone, address,trueName ) VALUES (#{userName}, #{passWord}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{trueName})
